title: Marketplace
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: marketplace-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20266
	- preferred-term:: Marketplace
	- status:: draft
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Digital platform enabling discovery, exchange, and transaction of virtual goods, services, and assets within or across metaverse systems through listing, escrow, and reputation mechanisms.
	- source:: [[OMA3 + Reed Smith]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: mv:Marketplace
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:VirtualObject
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[VirtualEconomyDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[MiddlewareLayer]], [[ApplicationLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: marketplace-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Blockchain]]
		- is-part-of:: [[Virtual Economy]]
		- has-part:: [[Product Listing]]
		- has-part:: [[Search & Discovery]]
		- has-part:: [[Payment Gateway]]
		- has-part:: [[Reputation System]]
		- has-part:: [[Escrow System]]
		- has-part:: [[Transaction Engine]]
		- requires:: [[Digital Wallet]]
		- requires:: [[Identity System]]
		- requires:: [[Smart Contract]]
		- requires:: [[Asset Registry]]
		- enables:: [[Secure Transaction]]
		- enables:: [[Value Exchange]]
		- enables:: [[Economic Activity]]
		- enables:: [[Price Discovery]]
		- enables:: [[Asset Trading]]
		- depends-on:: [[Blockchain]]
		- depends-on:: [[Payment Protocol]]
		- depends-on:: [[Metadata Standard]]
		- is-dependency-of:: [[Play-to-Earn (P2E)]]
	- #### CrossDomainBridges
	  id:: marketplace-bridges
	  collapsed:: true
		- dt:uses:: [[Machine Learning]]
		- bc:validates:: [[NFT]]

ontology.definition: Digital platform enabling discovery, exchange, and transaction of virtual goods, services, and assets within or across metaverse systems through listing, escrow, and reputation mechanisms.
